item.title: Artificial Intelligence Promises a New Paradigm for Healthcare
item.dc:creator: WMIF Admin
item.description:
Click here to view full article from XtelligentMedia The speed with which artificial intelligence has become an inescapable component of every new technology offering is either highly encouraging or deeply troubling, depending on the observer’s zeal or trepidation around the notion of integrating data-rich algorithms into the complex and highly personal practice of caring for…

The post Artificial Intelligence Promises a New Paradigm for Healthcare appeared first on 2020 World Medical Innovation Forum.
item.content:encoded:
Click here to view full article from XtelligentMedia

The speed with which artificial intelligence has become an inescapable component of every new technology offering is either highly encouraging or deeply troubling, depending on the observer’s zeal or trepidation around the notion of integrating data-rich algorithms into the complex and highly personal practice of caring for patients.

 

The post Artificial Intelligence Promises a New Paradigm for Healthcare appeared first on 2020 World Medical Innovation Forum.
